message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with a problem of recovering locations from pairwise direction observations, which involves techniques from information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), computational geometry (cs.CG), and statistics (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the use of a convex program, which is a common tool in optimization and data science (cs.DS).
